name: Word Wizard
description:
WARNING: Not compatible with Windows 11.

Post Jam patch includes:

  • Improved UX
  • Fixed numeric key inputs

The wizard Acrolectus, vain old bastard that he is, has been secretly working on a forbidden spell to try and stop his precious silver hair from thinning. 

One problem… the fool has got his words mixed up - rather than prolonging his youth he’s brought forwards his own demise! Now Death himself has ripped open a portal to come and claim him. 

Type the words to cast the spells and destroy the enemies. If he can put the spell right, maybe he can cling to his life (and hair) just a little bit longer.
